text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr Mr Trump, aka Prof Irwin Corey, good question. Maybe it’s because you can only handle one thing at a time or the stable genius is out to lunch. 
It’s Been Two Months Since the President Promised Nationwide Drive-In Coronavirus Testing. Where Is It?
